name: TextDrawShowForPlayer
tips: If only a single player will see a textdraw, it might be wise to use player-textdraws instead. This is also useful for textdraws that need to show information specific for an individual player.
description: Shows a textdraw for a specific player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to show the textdraw for.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to show. Returned by TextDrawCreate.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means either the player and/or textdraw specified does not exist.
related_fn:
TextDrawHideForPlayer: Hide a textdraw for a certain player.
 TextDrawShowForAll: Show a textdraw for all players.
 TextDrawHideForAll: Hide a textdraw for all players.
